website_summaries.verdict: Although its battery life remains a weak point and its price has gone up a bit, the Flip 2 is an improvement over the original Flip and one of the best mini portable Bluetooth speakers available.
pros: The JBL Flip 2 is a highly portable Bluetooth speaker that's designed to be used horizontally or vertically
It sounds good and plays very loud for its size, has speakerphone capabilities, NFC tap-to-pair, and ships with a nice carrying case
cons: At around 4 to 5 hours, battery life remains so-so

customer_reviews.title: Won't Charge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker in 2015 and it never held a charge for long, which I lived with because I used it in the kitchen and always had an outlet nearby. But now it won't even work if plugged in. It should've lasted longer than three years. I am very disappointed. The sound, however, was great. I listen to books on tapes and no matter where my phone was the bluetooth worked well too. But if the the speaker doesn't work at all, well it gets one star.
customer_reviews.author: KST

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE Charge port is defective point of failure
customer_reviews.text: It sounds awesome but I had the unit for about 8 months when the charge port failed. Harman sent me a warranty replacement (REFURB - which was a bit disappointing) The REFURB unit lasted about the same amount of time and...you guessed it, charge port failed on that one too. Harman declined to replace it again. Totally bummed that a product with JBL name reputation and normally puts out great product would not rectify this defective point of failure. Many reviews here state this same issue.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend. I bought this speaker and it started shorting ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't recommend. I bought this speaker and it started shorting out. When I had it connected to AUX or Bluetooth the sound would stop. I would have to turn up the volume to get it to work again. I exchanged it for another one. 6 months later: same issue. I contacted the seller and they have not contacted me in return. A JBL speaker should last more than 6 months. I bought the first one in June 2015 and now on 12/15/2015, the second one doesn't work. Needless to say, don't buy from this seller. Buy from a reputable source like Best Buy or Fred Meyer or sourced from Amazon.com. Buyer beward..
customer_reviews.author: jswilson17

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until it died age
customer_reviews.text: Bought it July 29, 2015 and it died March 14, 2019 at 3 years and 8 months old. It has an amazing sound and easy to pair. Though, after about 2 years pairing became more difficult. I had thousands of hours of use and it was worth what i paid - though i wish it lasted longer (hence the lower rating)
customer_reviews.author: calc chick

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good but needs a few tweeks
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a while now and the sound is great for it's size. The only complaint is the unit will not stay on when plugged in to the wall charger like some other brands. When I plug my phone/notepad in the charger for the night I have the blue tooth come on and hook to the speaker so in the morning I can hear music though it rather than the phone/speakers. This unit will have shut off during the night un like some other ones I have. I think this would be a easy change and a great help to sales.
customer_reviews.author: ranman

customer_reviews.title: JBL made in china
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker and a week later it stopped working. It's froze. Couldn't reset it, called JBL and they advised me to return it because it's wasn't repairable over the phone. All lights would lid up, but would not do anything. I would not purchase this kind of product anymore, disappointed. Luckily it was still under the 14 day return policy. But imagine a year later, when warranty runs out. You would be out of all the money you paid for. Not worth it. Poor quality and overpriced products.
customer_reviews.author: Honest

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it...
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker has excellent sound and is very loud. It pairs easily with my iPhone or Echo Dot. It's easy to transport. I got the refurbished version and so far it works great. Battery life is good too. Update, 1 month later: Unfortunately, I am now having trouble keeping the speaker charged. I plug it in but it does not charge or just barely charges. The deadline to return it has passed. Very disappointed, since I liked the sound and was enjoying it until it had trouble charging.
customer_reviews.author: Kaley Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I originally posted that this unit does not have controllable volume. Thanks to another reviewer, I learned that it does. By pushing on opposite sides of the end plate, the one that, on mine, only has the phone and Bluetooth icons, I have now found that I can control the volume. Cool. UPDATE: Even with the volume control, this unit does NOT provide enough volume to let you go off the speaker of your phone. I've found that its volume is LOWER than that of my speaker on my phone. Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Austin reader

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable for the money, gets loud, don't except a magic device and you should be happy.
customer_reviews.text: Typical JBL portable sound. Nothing earth shattering quality wise but the device gets very loud and can fill a surprisingly large space and doesn't offend my "audiophile" sensibilities. If you're looking for something to travel with I'd audition the JBL Micro series as well as I find those to be more than enough for most hotel rooms or travel scenarios I find myself in. I actually prefer the JBL Micro Wireless a bit more due to the price difference and better portability. Yes, the Micro doesn't sound as good but there isn't enough of a difference for me to care and I vastly prefer the portability of the Micro.
customer_reviews.author: Bootleg figure detector

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I am brutal on speakers. I admit it. This little JBL speaker has survived much abuse and still sounds as good as the first day. The battery lasts about 4 hours. The sound is good for it’s size. I like that it’s small and portable.
customer_reviews.author: denise p.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item for a few YEARS and it still working as good as day 1.. battery life is solid so is the item it self.. I got my wife the flip 4 when it came out and was thinking of replacing my 2 but realized... It's still working perfectly!!! So why replace it.. For the money it was worth ever penny spent!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: If you have the choice and the cash, this is your speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this, the Oontz, and the Sardine. This was the most expensive of the three, and performed the best, as far as bass and power output were concerned. But in a head to head with two models that cost half as much, I expected that. It is a good, clear and ideal speaker for a 12 x 12 foot enclosed space or a small patio bar (which is where we keep it). If you can afford the higher price, choose the JBL Flip. But the Oontz and the Sardine are admirable performers for half the price, with a little trade off on the bass. The decision boils down to the Benjamins.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hilt

customer_reviews.title: Size, weight, sound, battery are very good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought since I travel and require showing videos and powerpoint with projectors that typically don't have sound. The volume is way better than I thought it would be, and quality very good to. Wish it had more base, but for the size it is actually very good. Weight is also not very much, so can fit in my carrying bag Also used it outside for family gatherings in outside patio, and has a very good sound. Battery lasts hours. Recharge takes time, but an overnight charge leaves it ready for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Appalling Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Outstanding sound quality. Small. Cons: The battery life is awful. I'm lucky if this will play for two hours without having to recharge. I use it for about 20 minutes each morning and it won't last a work week without needing to be recharged for 4 hours. I wanted to like this because it sounds great, but I would strongly recommend finding an option with a practical battery.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Paul E. Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: When a relative had a JBL Flip 2 Portable Wireless Speaker and we used it at a get-together and I saw how much better this one s
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this product. I had purchased several other wireless speakers over time and was totally turned off to any and all of them. When a relative had a JBL Flip 2 Portable Wireless Speaker and we used it at a get-together and I saw how much better this one sounded and operated than any of the others I'd purchased I had to buy one just like his. Amazon had the speaker as a special deal one day and that made the purchase even better. I LOVE THIS SPEAKER and all the great things it allows me to listen to (even a movie on my computer while taking a bath, =)
customer_reviews.author: Kobysmere

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker! Very small and lightweight. For the price, it puts out PLENTY of sound and bass. It can fill up a large living/dining room with sound. I also really like how you can pair 2 different SmartPhones with it, and it has very good battery life. Also good bluetooth range, if you happen to walk into a different room with your cell phone paired to it. The carrying case that comes with it is also very nice. For the price, I couldn't be happier with this product... I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: what a waste of $80
customer_reviews.text: First of all this cake with no charger, just the speaker and the case. I didnt make a big deal of it tho because I have loads of chargers that fit it. The killer is that after just using this 6 times it stopped working. it refuses to turn on. I only charged it twice to further prove how little it was used. what a waste of $80. it sounded great and loud for my audio books while it worked but $80 for 6 uses? and I cant even return it because I'm away and i wouldnt have been able to return it until 2 days after the stupid 30 day warranty is up. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika T.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit as a gift. Prior to purchasing, I compared this unit to several other wireless speakers (three pill by beats, Sony, Phillips, Altec, and more). This speaker had the best sound quality, size, and ease of use, not to mention price. The bass output was amazing. You can adjust the highs depending on the phone features. The battery life definitely could be longer, but that is manageable due to android usb charging system. Just connect to your computer or phone charger. I would rate higher, if the battery was comparable to other speakers. Love the system. Thinking of purchasing one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tra Da Stay

customer_reviews.title: Really great sound in these small footprint speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Wow...wow...wow!!!! I was totally blow away at the sound these little speakers are capable of producing. They are amazing. I am not an audio guru. Just a regular person who likes music. The user documentation is not great, but a short utube video showed me how easy it was to pair with my iphone. Go to settings, open bluetooth, make sure bluetooth is turned on. I turned on the speakers, iphone found them immediately and they paired in 30 seconds. I have an iphone 4s running 7.1.2.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Powerful speaker
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I had purchased the first JBL speaker and I still have it. My boyfriend loves the how powerful and clear this little speaker sounds so I decided to get him one. This wireless speaker is not only made out of good materials that make it last a long time, it is also very practical. I've compared brands that were more expensive and I didn't see a difference or a reason to spend more money on those other ones. Highly recommended. Take the party with you wherever you go!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Oyarzabal

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's absolutey perfect The bass sounds great, will recommend this purchase. Wasn't expecting the sound to project itself as I thought it would. For a small speaker it's loud and I love loud! For those who do too it's a Good outdoor speaker as well. Good price, good product! I love it. Battery lasts about 5-6 hours with me. You can use an android charger to charger the speaker. Overall, this product, I recommend buying!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for about 2 months now and it is great. The sound quality is good to excellent. The battery life is good, if it isn't plugged in it can die after a few hours. The most important thing is its volume is excellent. I have it in my garage shop when woodworking and I can hear it over the dust collector and table saw. It also fills the entire floor of my house. I enjoy this product and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Big sound for such a little speaker! We ordered this after another family member had bought it and played it for us. We were amazed at the big crisp, clear sound. I also considered buying the BOSE version of the mini but decided it was not worth the additional cost. Especially when you have to use BOSE proprietary charger and they do not have a universal USB charger like everyone else does. You will absolutely love this JBL Flip2. We purchased this to use for a lot of different applications. One was to use in conjunction with the IVATION Portable Projector. Well worth the money and everyone that sees and hears you with it will want one too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a year
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this little portable speaker in August of 2015. I’ve not used extensively, just moderately. Worked well for over a year then stared losing ability to hold charge slowly over the course of time. Will not hold a charge now at all, but up until recently would work if was plugged into the charger. Sadly the female charging receiver or port on the speaker is loose and will not even hold the charging cord in place. This makes the speak trash now.
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something fairly inexpensive with good/loud sound. Got it as a gift and the recipient loves it. I spent a lot of time researching these types of speakers and finally settled on this. So glad I did. Price was right for the sound quality and it gets loud enough for most needs. Easy to use. Small but powerful. Sort of wish it had a radio feature as well, but the recipient didn't mind that.
customer_reviews.author: SqueezeBox

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for its size and price, can be frustrating to get it to connect.
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound for the price and size and solidly built. Bluetooth connections can be slow or fail to connect at all. There seems to be a protocol for successful connection that is not outlined in the "instructions" or anyplace online that I could find, which was frustrating. It is easier to connect it to an old Vista laptop with a after-market Bluetooth dongle than my newer gadgets with Bluetooth built in, go figure...Love the built in battery and the ability to use while it is charging. It lasts exactly the 3 hours on a charge it says.
customer_reviews.author: Canyonjo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but won't charge!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, but even if you take care of it the female micro USB charge port will not maintain a connection. Hard to listen to your tunes when the device won't charge. Unfortunately, JBL's customer service won't stand by their product. I acknowledge that I called after two years of purchasing the item, but it wasn't used much and when it was, it was used gently. In doing a Google search for a solution, I note that soooo many others have had the same issue. If you do purchase, I strongly recommend marking your calendar for 10 months out from purchase date so you can get it swapped out. You'll need it! What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Was somewhat skeptical of the reviews I read on this but figured there were enough believers to take a chance. I like my music loud and this little guy delivers - with excellent sound quality for its size. Low ends are deep and full and overall sound is surprising when you look over and see this small package. The only knock I have is that I wish it would last longer than 3-4 hours at decent volume and that the case was built to include the cord. Overall though, I still give it a five for sound - that's what you're buying.
customer_reviews.author: A7XRavens

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had it for several years and it's sound is awesome. My only wish was the sound range was more, so I could play it quieter when its in my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Keep away from teenagers!!!  Tooo LOUD!!!  :)
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars even though I hate it!! It was a Christmas gift to my teenaged daughter, this little speaker has so much sound it vibrates the whole upstairs of my house, I am that mother screaming over the speaker to "LOWER THAT!!" The price was right, the unit is super small and the sound is extreme!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine A Barr

customer_reviews.title: This is easily double the volume level of my Jawbone Mini Jambox
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Xmas gift for my sister...when I received the box from Amazon, I could not resist "testing" it out. This is easily double the volume level of my Jawbone Mini Jambox. I was confused as to the proper orientation of the speaker...it is a cylinder with a slight flat spot on the bottom, so if you lay it lengthwise on a table it will kinda rock back and forth until it finds its level. I decided to stand it on its end. The ends are angled a bit, but it stands up very well; no worries of it falling over. I will be selling my Jambox and replacing it with this JBL Flip 2.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Speaker for Such a Small Item!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product after using it at a friend's house. I absolutely love it. It has great sound quality. Easy to use. I was surprised at how often I actually use it. I use it to talk on the phone when I don't want to hold it while working around the house, I use it when guests are over for music, while cooking in the kitchen, etc. I'd highly recommend it to anyone looking for a portable speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING FOR THE SIZE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before the third one came out and spent the original 100 dollars and I do not regret it at all! I love it for its small form factor and its sound. Not a party speaker, more like a room filled with your favorite music. But, if you have a 100 dollars to spend, I would most definitely but the third one but for the reduced price right now (65 the time of this review), would get it again!
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Guzmán Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sound quality. Battery life is great. I love the case. It projects a decent, even sound. Bass response is balanced, that is to say very present but not boomy or overwhelming. I really like the sound of this. An added bonus is that you can orient it "landscape" or "portrait" based on your available space. Bluetooth setup was a breeze, and it works fine with a cable as well. I have to admit that I have not tried competing products, but at this point I have no need. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mike

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BOTHER! I'm on my second JBL and there is a major design flaw with the USB charger. I traded the first one in because after 6 months or so of light to moderate use, the charger kept coming loose and I could never get it to fully charge properly. JBL was kind enough to send me a new one, but I'm having the same problem again with this one, sadly realizing this was not a one time fluke. Once again the USB has come loose and I can no longer get it to fully charge. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: lbk

customer_reviews.title: JBL knows exactly what they're doing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! This speaker gets very loud for it's smaller size. The bass isn't the highlight but it's still present. I'm very pleased. I just wish the battery life was longer. I only get about 3 hours of continuous use at max volume. Other than that it's a great wireless speaker. JBL knows exactly what they're doing!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Saddler

customer_reviews.title: Great product for speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great product for speakers. I use it via bluetooth with my ipad or iphone. Although I bought this a month ago, the top cover seems to be wearing it for its design. It doesn't affect the sound, just the appearance. My other JBL Flip doesn't have this aesthetic issue, since the cover isn't made from the same material. Recommend this product for its sould quality based on its affordable price (in comparison to other models in the market).
customer_reviews.author: ReviewerOfGoods

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a small unit
customer_reviews.text: I listened to several bluetooth speakers, and this definitely has the best and loudest sound for the price.Highly recommended. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is I wish the battery life was longer. I do find, if you are playing it quietly for background music the battery lasts a long time....more than the 5 hours advertised. The only strange thing I found is that when used with an Apple device, the volume control on the Flip also controls the volume on the device , but when used with an Android device, the volume controls work independently. Strange, but not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in September of 2016; it is November of 2017 and this item will not even charge itself anymore. I have tried a handful of different cords; it will not work. The speaker has had a problem with holding a charge and would normally only play for about 2 hours on a full charge before dying. Good sound quality; but the battery life doesn't last long and I have no run into the problem where it just won't charge. Take into mind as well that I took great care of this thing and it never left my house.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Okay speaker - broke within 2-years
customer_reviews.text: The speaker was okay - the volume was great the sound quality was too bright. The battery life was a little short. It was a great size to bring over to friends houses and road trips.The price was right. However, after almost 2-years it no longer works. Each time the speaker is turned on it sounds out the connect to bluetooth noise and won't connect to any of my devices anymore. I guess 2-years is about the expected timeline for electronics these days but I hate the throw away e-waste mentality and just buy another cheap crap product. Maybe I'll try something a little more expensive in the hopes the quality will be there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: This little device is a Big Bang for the buck. Have had several years. At a recent outdoor party, many comment on the quality of sound out of such a small device. My daughter uses hers in her classroom. Sits up on the map holder. I set it out by the spa. Can be used anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: N. Elder

customer_reviews.title: I rarely write review but I love this speaker too much so I decided to write ...
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write review but I love this speaker too much so I decided to write one. I'm glad I didn't go with a cheaper model. I have it for about two weeks now and I've been using it daily. The only thing I wish that I can use headphones cuz looks like there's a hole (headphone jack) for where you can plug the headphones in but I've tried and didn't work. If you listen to music from smart phone a lot like myself, highly recommended to go with this model. There's a hard case come with it, very nice material and provides great protection for the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Orchids

customer_reviews.title: We all love them. Great output
customer_reviews.text: This is the third I've bought. One for me, both brothers and mom. We all love them. Great output, great sound. With it had a port to plug in a device, but it's still a great speaker. Would, and have, bought again.
customer_reviews.author: LexMark

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Had a TDK outdoor wireless speaker but it kept cutting in and out and the sound quality was OK... but, I love the JBL Flip 2... lithium battery provides strong sound for a longer period... have yet to run out of juice. Just found the volume control on the speaker which would have been my only negative until I discovered it next to the power button...DUH. The sound quality and projection is excellent. Don't know how they do it in such a compact package. Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: it's been 2 years and it still works great! The battery life hasn't deminished much
customer_reviews.text: I still have this product, it's been 2 years and it still works great! The battery life hasn't deminished much, and it still plays loud! Best bang for your buck. It does dent easily though, I'm very careful with my things, but I do travel a lot and I usually bring this speaker with me. It does come with a protective shell case, I wasn't using it when I should've been.. I recommend this speaker if you're looking for something for a picnic or your apt/room, ect. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, works as advertised. The rubber rim makes it easy to use in any orientation, horizontal or vertical. It connect easily to my phone (iphone) and sounds great. Thus far seems to run for quite a while on a charge, easy to move around when doing odd jobs around the house and I use it a lot when I am in the shower (plenty of volume to go over the shower noise). I have had it for several months now and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: donald scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy to configure
customer_reviews.text: Easy to configure. Connects right away. Good sound. Controls are on the side, and don't detract, but still easy to use. All around good value. May 2017: I'm downgrading my rating based on the failure of the unit to charge. Less than three years of limited use and relatively few charges doesn't sound like a reason for the product to stop taking charge. I see for a bit of searching that others have similarly experience an inability of the product to take a charge. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: easily transported in its carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Compact, easily transported in its carrying case, NICE sound. Already enjoying using this around the pool and at the beach. My MP3 player doesn't have bluetooth but I can easily connect it to the Flip 2 with a two-way stereo mini-plug. My Ipad Air does have bluetooth and it paired up with the Flip 2 easily and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: FrankieXJS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Occasional signal interruption aside, this is a very powerful speaker! I've used it for singing auditions with tracks. You can hear it all over the place, even in open spaces. The signal thing is a given with any speaker, though -- and this one has reasonable price. Holds charge for enough time. I like that you can control volume, both on iTunes and on the speaker itself.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is less than one hour!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed by the battery life, which is no more than one hour for my product. The only reason keeping me from returning the product is that I live in Algeria and the cost of returning it would be about the same as its price. I don't know if it's my product itself or this is a general issue but I can't know at this point! Too bad I had this experience, I like JBL products.
customer_reviews.author: Hamdi

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works great, but it stopped working after a few months. They work fine for a while, but then they just stop taking a charge. Even when it is plugged in, I cannot use it. It looks like it's charging, but it won't turn on and it never actually charges. It just blinks and blinks forever. It would be a great product if it worked for longer than six months. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mha Atma S Khalsa

customer_reviews.title: Good While It Lasted
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound for the price point. And this thing is loud! UPDATE: Worked wonderful while it lasted. All of a sudden it stopped taking a charge. The problem seems to be the USB charging port. A quick search of the internet shows that this is a known defective part in this product. I don’t use it all that often, so it’s not like I wore the part out. Also, good luck trying to get in touch with service at JBL to see if it can be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: The Middleman

customer_reviews.title: quality product - quite well made and performs excellently
customer_reviews.text: We hold long distance church services with a couple in Florida (from Oregon) and acquired this to enhance sound quality. It is an enormous improvement over the public speaker on our cell phone. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: new user

customer_reviews.title: Six month lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from this little speaker- volume adjustments are hard to see, but sounds good even at high volume. However, I would expect it to last longer than 6 months- like the other bad reviews just stopped taking a charge, not even enough to play while connected. I'll be trying to contact Jbl, but it's not w very high hopes...
customer_reviews.author: Sue L McClaflin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! Easy to pair with our cellphones and tablet. This is the second one we've purchased and we will probably buy a third.
customer_reviews.author: RA Bell

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this piece of junk. I bought it at $99 thinking it was a good deal. I spend as much time charging it as listening to it. Truly pathetic battery life. As a bonus, it won't play while charging. This is an infuriating product at any price and jvc should be ashamed of themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mother's Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: I love this - my dog bought it for me for Mother's Day. It goes well with my iPOD Classic which is what I wanted it for. Works well with my smart phone too! Great for my patio and goes anywhere I go. I could not make up my mind between this and the BOSE - pretty close! We travel on motorcycle a lot and this goes well everywhere we go - I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: The sound from this speaker is pretty darn good. I was surprised at how clear it is. Great value and perfect for trips because it's so compact. Fits inmy purse! I only wish you could fit the charger in the case so it could all be kept together but overall, this is a great speaker. I got one for my sister too and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has great sound. I purchased this after hearing it in a coworkers office. He had always played music through his computer speakers until that computer crashed. I walked in one morning and was like...."wow!!! Where is that music coming from?!?!?" When he showed me the speaker I couldn't believe that quality of sound was coming from a speaker that size!!! I bought mine that same day and am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M'shell

customer_reviews.title: I really like the size and how it sound but unfortunately it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on September 2016 and it broke on July 2017. I use it to liste to music while I cook or do shores. I really like the size and how it sound but unfortunately it doesn't last very long. Oh I received one of these as a Christmas gift and it lasted the same I thought that it was a problem with that one that is why I decided to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended - Rich JBL sound, Ease of use, Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: A great speaker in a compact, sturdy package. Typical rich JBL sound with natural-sounding lows and subtle highs. Connects instantly and easily via Bluetooth to my Windows 7 laptop, Android phone and Windows phone. Excellent battery life and can be charged with a standard (non-proprietary) USB charger. Automatically switches to speakerphone mode if your phone rings while listening to music on your phone. It was so good that my younger daughter "borrowed" it permanently. I had to buy another one and inevitably, my older daughter has "borrowed" it! I guess it's time to buy one more... Great value for money - highly recommended. (Make sure you get the Flip 2 -- not the older Flip).
customer_reviews.author: Jaykayess

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker....worthless charger!!
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is great but the charger never worked out of the box. Expect to supply your own charger. I went online and found out many people had the same issues and the seller offered no help. I would have given it 5 stars if it weren't for the charger problem.
customer_reviews.author: BNC

customer_reviews.title: Took me too long to finally buy a nice little Bluetooth speaker but very glad that I chose this one!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound from a small foot print. I love that you can place it vertical or horizontal. Again sound is rich. Re-chargeable built-in battery seems to have about a 4-5 hour life. I would recommend over a similar Sony product that my co-worker has as we have compared them back to back in the same room from the same iPhone. Makes my work shift much more pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Erik B

customer_reviews.title: Sound Good but Base Much Weaker Than Bose
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound for the price. Solid highs and mid range. Base tight but lacking. I compared it with the $200 Bose Soundlink Mini speaker and the Bose had much more base. Everyone in the room noticed immediately that the Bose was superior. The price however is less than half that of the Bose I guess that is what you should expect. It has a volume control on the speaker which is useful. Bluetooth linking was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Cober

customer_reviews.title: The speaker is perfect. The base is perfect and sound is clear
customer_reviews.text: The speaker arrived on time and meets it's description. The speaker is perfect. The base is perfect and sound is clear. It's amazing how high the volume can go from such a small component. This is my second pair. I bought the first one for my son to take to college.
customer_reviews.author: Nidia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice clear highs and lows
customer_reviews.text: Very nice clear highs and lows. I am amazed at the quality and sound. It picks up sounds that you never hear unless you have a good system. Very happy with the JBL. Everybody that hears it cant believe the clarity. has good volume as well. Forgot to mention I am using it on my Echo Dot. Sounds super.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Moya

customer_reviews.title: The sound/music is loud enough and sounds very good. Very easy to connect to our iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. The sound/music is loud enough and sounds very good. Very easy to connect to our iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch devices via Bluetooth. We also have a projector that we watch sports and movies on in the backyard. I used the 3.5mm cable to connect to the projector and the soundtrack sounded great! Battery life seems good, price was right, very happy with choice.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Keltner

customer_reviews.title: It sounded great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I can't use this anymore as the connection port in speaker bent after recharging maybe 6 times. It also became loose and went inside speaker. It sounded great while it lasted. Total waste of money for having a cheap port on an expensive speaker.
customer_reviews.author: LetyN

customer_reviews.title: Great at what it does, could do more though.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have been very good to me over the course of my time with it. They are pretty straight forward speakers and the things it does, it does very well. The sound quality is good, connecting with devices is easy, and the volume is never lacking. However, the speakers do tend to overemphasize the midrange sounds to the detriment of any bass and treble notes that you might want to hear. It also lacks some features found in other speakers in the price range such as a USB port that allows you to charge your phone. Overall though, it is a very satisfying buy with great sound quality and volume for a bluetooth speaker this size.
customer_reviews.author: Seo

customer_reviews.title: Love, love love the sound!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this Bluetooth speaker. I bought a different one and wasn't happy with it at all. Reading the reviews really helped me make the right decision on this one. The guy who checked out all three for sound and base was right on! It has amazing power and sound. I am really happy! I would recommend this JBL Flip 2 to everyone. Priced right and comes with its own case too! Very happy girl.
customer_reviews.author: Yllwrobin

customer_reviews.title: ... the quality with All JBL Gear this speaker is great, nice low end and very clear
customer_reviews.text: As the quality with All JBL Gear this speaker is great, nice low end and very clear. I purchased this for on the road traveling to watch movies and Listen to music while staying in hotels and its road ready and already proven to be perfecr for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Kulbacki

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker! The JBL Flip 2 is a fantastic product. The volume range is great and it doesn't sound muffled, like some other speakers, when you turn the volume up all the way. The battery lasts for a couple of hours if its not plugged in. I take this all around the house and outside with me when I'm doing house work. I've also brought it with me to friends' houses and work. I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend's mom, but loved it so much that she got me one for my birthday! This is the best wireless speaker I've found yet!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I didn't expect much out of this little speaker, even after reading the reviews. I was definitely surprised the first time I used it. The speaker has no problem filling a large room with sound. I figured that the room acoustics made it sound great, and wondered how it would perform outdoors. Once again, I was pleasantly surprised with the volume this speaker puts out. I've heard that JBL has great products, but had never owned anything of theirs before. After owning the Flip 2, I would not hesitate to consider their products again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and loud if you want it
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and loud if you want it. Before purchasing this speaker we compared it to others costing twice as much and we really couldn't tell difference between them. So why pay more? The only down side is that the battery life could be better. We've gotten 5 hours use per charge, but I imagine that if you play it with the volume turned way up you'll get less time.
customer_reviews.author: nap

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This speaker comes with a travel case and is super portable. The overal sound is great and it is super easy to connect to your device. I know in the past I have had other brands that made it more challenging to get the Bluetooth connect however this was a breeze. I also like how durable this speaker feels.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound - great product!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson recommended these speakers. I ordered them on Amazon and within days they were at my house. They have a beautiful sound quality and very portable. I use them when I'm driving my brother's old pick-up truck. I listen to audio books and music to make the time go by faster. Great system for the truck and the home. Portable stereo for the deck, parties, and work. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and suprising machine.
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful machine. Do not underestimate it's size. It's volume can fill 700 square foot living rooms and then some. Fidelity is acceptable and satisfactory for the size. Very simple to use and can be mounted in two ways. The only downside is the 5 hour battery time, but other than that, best portable speaker under $100. Beats out what Bose sells for twice that.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Lemus

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings.
customer_reviews.text: Bit disappointed with this. It works but cuts in and out as the battery goes. And it doesn't autofind the Bluetooth well. Has to be manually added each time I use it. And though the volume is adjustable it's not good in every situation.
customer_reviews.author: RReedd20

customer_reviews.title: plus I have a JBL IPhone dock speaker and it is fantastic. So glad I got the JBL for half ...
customer_reviews.text: I almost bought a $200 B**e unit but the reviews made me decide on the JBL, plus I have a JBL IPhone dock speaker and it is fantastic. So glad I got the JBL for half the cost of other wireless speakers. There is so much volume and excellent base and highs that I can only highly recommend this speaker to anyone that wants a reasonably priced unit and fill your patio or porch with great sound. More than met my expectations!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Fairfax

customer_reviews.title: JBL Flip Portable.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the product for a week. I like the quality of the sound and the loudness. It is perfect for me when working in the hard. So far I have run the unit with the volume pretty loud and it play music for a little over two hours before needing another charge. Four 1/2 the price of the Bose unit, I think this is decent value. Also, like the case it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: John & Becky

customer_reviews.title: Worked great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Worked great while it lasted. JBL really should've recalled this unit. Pretty much anyone who's had this unit more than a year has experienced the failure of the USB charger. And guess what. The warranty only last one year. How convenient. Don't let the good reviews fool you. These are mostly people thrilled with a NEW product. I was initially geeked about the purchase as well. Last JBL for me ever frankly. I recommend the Bose or Amazon speakers. JBL stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Replacing my car sound system haha
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, defined rich tight bass with very clear highs. Worth every penny. I would pay $100 for this but this is one of many great Bluetooth speakers for less than $100 on the market today. I agree the battery does not last long but the sound quility is worth it, if you need more than 5 hours from on charge don't buy this otherwise it's great for me & many many other of things!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Tolp

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker. For the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great blue tooth speaker. It’s loud for a small speaker. And portable. Con is Battery life isn’t that great but I can deal with that.
customer_reviews.author: DJ NikKol

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about this speaker except one thing
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the sound is superb. I like everything about this speaker except one thing. It has absolutely no base, I mean ZERO. It does however make up for it in sound quality. I do wish it had more base. For the price I'm happy with the purchase, but again, NO BASE... Pretty much my only complaint. So if you don't care about the nice, deep "thump thump thump" sound, this is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic little speaker
customer_reviews.text: JBL Flip 2 Portable Wireless Speaker (Black). This is a fantastic little speaker. I use if with Amazon Prime music on my iphone. I can bring it from room to room. Great tone and volume. Very clear sound - I have hearing deficits and this audio is so much better than my TVs and radios. I wish I had known about this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: snoshow

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Connects quickly to previously paired iPhone and has great sound. Bought one for my brother, too.
customer_reviews.author: MagnoliaNM

customer_reviews.title: best buy for a mobile stereo system
customer_reviews.text: we got a theater system from JBL and love the sound of this speaker. Standing in front of a wall gives the sound even more depth and it doesn't sound like being 'under water' or in a tin can (like other product reviews). I ride my horse in an inside arena (100' x 200') and the JBL filled it easily with sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Great used for outdoor wedding !
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works great. We bought this to use for our music for our outdoor wedding. We only had about 50 guest. But this thing was way loud enough for everyone to hear our music while we walked down the isle. Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Malissa R.

customer_reviews.title: BOOM
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is THE BOMB. I bought it for my mom as a Christmas gift and she loves it. My little brother uses it too. Oh, it's worth noting I had one before I bought it and LOVE the sound quality. I'm a recording arts graduate and don't often say something sounds great, but this does. Way better than any Beats out there
customer_reviews.author: Christov

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Rivals my JBL Charge+
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents since they liked the sound of my JBL Charge 2. I was immediately surprised and jealous when I noticed it sounded just and good and loud as my Charge, which is $50 more! The battery however is not as good but still, it's a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marco B

customer_reviews.title: Overcharging a Flip 2 Speaker???
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Flip and absolutely loved it....until after leaving it for 4 months decided to charge it and use it. I plugged in the charger and left it overnight to give it a good charge. Seems I "overcharged" the battery, according to JBK support. I was told not to charge it for more than 4 hours which I didn't see in any manual (did I miss that?) So, now, my Flip 2 is bugg**ed. Hopefully they will do something for me, since it is under warranty. One year warranty through JBL but if bought on Amazon, you get 30-90 days!
customer_reviews.author: Keithcanuck

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth speaker out there.
customer_reviews.text: Flipping amazing! (Pun intended) I replaced my original Flip with this one and it is a huge improvement. MUCH more bass and volume. I honestly put it on the lowest volume setting with my iPad (which connected flawlessly) and it is more than enough. Plenty of room to increase as needed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Donelson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sound for the price. This speaker is surprisingly loud and sharp. I do not have a cd player in my work van so this along with my bluetooth enabled smartphone make great companions as I go through my work day. Plus it runs on battery power for about 6 hours so I can take it where ever I go. It charges through the standard android phone car charger.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 18 months and die
customer_reviews.text: Acoustics are good and easy to set up but for a product with JBL brand i would have expected that it would last more than 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: CAVU

customer_reviews.title: Sore sent me a unit that looked like it was a Reject. I sent it back got a refund.
customer_reviews.text: Unit did not work I had to send it back and get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Sam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Flip 1
customer_reviews.text: I have the Flip 1 and it is a good portable radio with a big sound. I bought this one due to the easy USB charging since the flip is a standard charge. After getting it the feel is better quality and connectivity of bluetooth is automatic instead of reconnecting as the flip 1 required. it also has an even louder quality sound than the flip one. definitely worth the $69 I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: TeddyC

customer_reviews.title: Good sound.
customer_reviews.text: I'm no expert but I know what I like and I like the way my classic rock sounds coming out of the Flip 2! Compared it side by side on the store shelves against a lot of other Bluetooth speakers except the Bose and it beat all of the others including the Beats Pill. It just sounds more natural. Not like from a small speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Raymc

customer_reviews.title: Will not charge
customer_reviews.text: After enjoying the speaker, it started to be difficult to get the charger into the slot correctly. Speaker would not charge. Now, it is impossible to recharge the speaker. Great quality and loved it when it did work, but would not recommend due to charging issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Kuns

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: There's quite a bit of bang for your buck in this little sound maker! This is exactly what I was looking for: something that let loose the music not the pale shadow of it, something small & portable and under $100. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Flare Bare

customer_reviews.title: About the size and weight of a can of soda ...
customer_reviews.text: About the size and weight of a can of soda, this highly-portable compact speaker produces loud and clear sound. It comes with a durable hard shell carrying case and charging transformer. The only quibble would be that the shape makes it susceptible to rolling and I wouldn't place it near the edge of a tabletop for fear it could roll over the edge.
customer_reviews.author: FlowerLady

product_meta.title: JBL Flip 2 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
product_meta.description: Amazing wireless sound in a small, portable form factor. The award winning Flip 2 portable wireless speaker from JBL brings rich sound into your portable lifestyle. The Flip 2 uses two drivers and a built in bass port in a speaker that fits in your hand. Plus it has a built in microphones and SoundClear echo and noise cancellation technologies so you can use Flip 2 as a hands free speakerphone and never miss a word. JBL Flip 2 the wireless, portable, rechargeable battery powered speaker that doubles as your on the go entertainment powerhouse! Bluetooth Connectivity Allows you to wirelessly stream music through any Bluetooth enabled device. Built in Microphone The built–in microphone allows you to answer calls without skipping a beat. Rechargeable Battery Charge Flip II's internal batter for all day playback of your favorite tracks and media. Charging simply requires an AC Micro USB adapter, and can be accomplished just about anywhere. Aux Connection An auxiliary input (aux in) connector located on the rear of Flip II allows you to plug into practically any audio device. So add better sound to your laptop, MP3 player, or smart phone.
